# Bharat Matrimony â€“ Operator Input Form
 
**Focus Region:** North India (Hindi Belt)  
**Purpose:** Collect operator/member information . 

## Gender input dropdown logic
- chose an option from Male, Female in the dropdown
--- 

## Membership input dropdown logic
- chose an option from Are you a Free or Paid member?Free user, Paid membership in the dropdown 
--- 

## Age input dropdown logic
- chose an option from 25 to 40 in the dropdown
--- 

## Height input dropdown logic
- chose an option from 4'8" to 6'0" in the dropdown
---

## Marital Status input dropdown logic
- chose an option from Never Married, Divorced, Awaiting Divorce in the dropdown
---

## Eating Habits input dropdown logic
- chose an option from Vegetarian, Eggitarian, Non-Vegetarian in the dropdown
---

- chose an option from the dropdown
